title: Will Mechs vs Minions be at Essen?
body: Title ^. The release date of MvM coincides with Essen; any chance that Riot Games will be there showing Mechs v Minions off?

replies.body: We won't be at Essen this year.  We looked into it, and with Worlds overlapping here, we didn't have the resources to do it at a capacity that we'd be pleased with.
sad :) But as long as we can get the game from the EU store that's alright ;)

I thought the same thing, it CAN'T be coincidence the dates match like this, right? I mean of all the 365 days of the year they pick THAT ONE? What are the chances, like "Oh, our release date coincides with Essen? We didn't even notice..." *plsplspls* ^^

i don't think so, but the game itself was a big secret too. I think they will try to sell it online and see what happens. If its a success they will probably produce more and sell it in Europa, Asia too.
